author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

The `isAvailable()` member function is available in
* `edm::RefProd`
* `edm::Ref`
* `edm::Ptr`
* `edm::RefToBase`

but not in `edm::RefToBaseProd`, as was noticed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/41843#issuecomment-1574078890. This PR adds the `isAvailable()` to `edm::RefToBaseProd`.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests pass

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Potentially to be backported to 13_0_X (and 13_1_X).
title: Add isAvailable() function to RefToBaseProd
